name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quran Gallery App: Divine Wisdom Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab: Embark on Your Islamic Spiritual Journey with Islamic widgets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your daily digital experience with the QuranGallery.App, a unique Chrome extension designed to integrate Islamic wisdom and inspiration into your online routine. This extension transforms your new tab into a dual-columned portal that combines both visual engagement and educational content, making it more than just a tool, but a companion in your journey of faith and knowledge.

Quran Gallery App:
In the first column, immerse yourself in the Quran Gallery, a visually captivating space dedicated to the verses of the Quran. This interactive gallery not only displays the sacred text but also brings its teachings to life. It provides guidance, inspiration, and a serene moment of reflection amidst the hustle of daily life. Now, with the added feature to read the Quran directly in the extension, you can conveniently access and contemplate the holy verses anytime.

Islamic Widgets:
The second column is a comprehensive suite of Islamic widgets, each designed to enrich your understanding and practice of Islam:

Quranic Vocabulary: Enhance your Quranic Arabic vocabulary with easy-to-learn words and phrases, deepening your connection with the holy text.
Islamic Month Highlights: Stay in tune with the Islamic calendar, understanding the significance and observances of each Islamic month.
Islamic Expressions: Familiarize yourself with common Islamic expressions, enriching your daily interactions within the Muslim community.
Asma-UL-Husna: Reflect on the 99 Names of Allah, each representing a unique attribute of the Divine, to enhance your spiritual understanding and connection.
Asma-E-Muhammad (S.A.W): Delve into the names and attributes of the Prophet Muhammad (S.A.W), drawing inspiration from his exemplary life and teachings.
Six Kalimas: Study the Six Kalimas, essential declarations of Islamic faith, fundamental to the Muslim belief system.
Dua Manzil: Access a compilation of powerful Duas from the Quran and Hadith for guidance and protection in various life situations.
Experience tranquility upon opening a new tab with the recitation of Durood صَلَّی اللّٰہُ عَلَی النَّبِیِّ الْاُمِّیِّ.

QuranGallery.App is more than a Chrome extension; it's a daily companion for Muslims seeking to embed Islamic learning into their everyday online interactions. Ideal for anyone interested in Islam, from devout followers to curious learners, this extension is a gateway to a daily journey of faith, knowledge, and inspiration.

Elevate your new tab experience with QuranGallery.App and embark on a daily journey of faith, knowledge, and inspiration!

JazakAllah
